mapper.insert: /* FileInfoMapper.xml insertFileInfo 파일 정보 저장 */ INSERT INTO file_info ( ref_table, ref_id, file_type, sort_order, file_url, file_size, mime_type, file_name, original_file_name, create_date, create_user_id, updated_date, update_user_id ) VALUES ( CAST(#{refTable} AS ref_table_enum), #{refId}, CAST(#{fileType} AS file_type_enum), #{sortOrder}, #{fileUrl}, #{fileSize}, #{mimeType}, #{fileName}, #{originalFileName}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{createUserId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{createUserId} ) RETURNING file_id

/* FileInfoMapper.xml insertFileInfoBatch 파일 정보 배치 저장 */ INSERT INTO file_info ( ref_table, ref_id, file_type, sort_order, file_url, file_size, mime_type, file_name, original_file_name, create_date, create_user_id, updated_date, update_user_id ) VALUES
( CAST(#{item.refTable} AS ref_table_enum), #{item.refId}, CAST(#{item.fileType} AS file_type_enum), #{item.sortOrder}, #{item.fileUrl}, #{item.fileSize}, #{item.mimeType}, #{item.fileName}, #{item.originalFileName}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{item.createUserId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{item.createUserId} )
mapper.select: /* FileInfoMapper.xml selectByRefTableAndRefId 참조 테이블과 참조 ID로 파일 정보 조회 */ SELECT * FROM file_info WHERE ref_table = CAST(#{refTable} AS ref_table_enum) AND ref_id = #{refId} AND delete_date IS NULL ORDER BY file_type, create_date
/* FileInfoMapper.xml selectByFileId 파일 ID로 파일 정보 조회 */ SELECT * FROM file_info WHERE file_id = #{fileId} AND delete_date IS NULL
mapper.update: /* FileInfoMapper.xml deleteByRefTableAndRefIdAndFileType 특정 타입의 파일만 삭제 (논리 삭제) */ UPDATE file_info SET delete_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, delete_user_id = #{deleteUserId} WHERE ref_table = CAST(#{refTable} AS ref_table_enum) AND ref_id = #{refId} AND file_type = CAST(#{fileType} AS file_type_enum)
